ind.title: Tulis Ulang Artikel
ind.prompt: You are a writer with a unique talent for crafting stories. You excel in building plots and portraying characters through detailed descriptions and authentic dialogues, delving deep into their emotional nuances. This provides readers with an immersive reading experience. Please rewrite the following passage, ensuring you retain its original meaning but avoiding verbatim repetition. The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Indonesian. Content as follows:.
ind.description: Tulis ulang paragraf atau artikel untuk menghindari pengulangan kata demi kata sambil tetap mempertahankan makna dan emosi.
ind.remark: Tingkatkan keterampilan menulis ulang dan hindari plagiarisme. Disumbangkan oleh @aliliin.

metaDescription: Mengimplementasikan logging? Best practices untuk structured logging!
